name: MSc Finance
title: MSc Finance
description:
In today’s fast-paced global economy, deep industry knowledge as well as the ability to challenge conventional thinking and identify emerging opportunities are qualities needed to stand out in the competitive financial sector. The Master of Science (MSc) in Finance programme at Nanyang Business School enables young executives to succeed in the global finance industry, with a strategic focus on China and the broader Asia-Pacific region.
This intensive one-year, full-time programme offers a rigorous and immersive learning experience that broadens intellectual horizons and deepens our students’ financial acumen. They will have unparalleled access to tools, resources and opportunities that will allow them to gain insights, expand their perspectives and reshape how they see the world of finance, equipping them not only to navigate the complexities of today’s financial landscape but also to lead and innovate within it.
Learn More On The Admission Requirements
The MSc Finance programme equips students with a strong foundation in financial concepts, theories, and analytical techniques essential for success across a diverse finance ecosystem. The programme is designed for students to progressive learn and applying their knowledge through hands-on experimentation, critical analysis and the development of innovative solutions that reflect the real-world complexities of modern finance.
Future-Focused Interdisciplinary Curriculum
Our comprehensive curriculum takes our students through the dynamic and ever-evolving financial world, encompassing topics such as corporate finance, data science, investments among many other domains. Students will also have the opportunity to explore emerging fields with greater depth like sustainability and fintech.
Applied Learning
The programme’s unique teaching model will enable our students to gain a strong financial foundation with hands-on experience. Through the use of case studies, financial marketing simulations and projects featuring real l

sections.Future-Focused Interdisciplinary Curricu: Our comprehensive curriculum takes our students through the dynamic and ever-evolving financial world, encompassing topics such as corporate finance, data science, investments among many other domains. Students will also have the opportunity to explore emerging fields with greater depth like sustainability and fintech.
sections.Applied Learning: The programme’s unique teaching model will enable our students to gain a strong financial foundation with hands-on experience. Through the use of case studies, financial marketing simulations and projects featuring real live data, our students are enabled to apply their learnings into the workplace more effectively and quickly.
sections.Explore Global Perspectives: The MSc Finance programme is led by distinguished faculty from across the region, renowned for their strong academic credentials, rigorous teaching standards, and extensive industry experience, offering students a rich and well-rounded learning environment. Complementing their academic foundation are a series of curated Student Industry Field Trips (SIFT) that take our students through a series of activities and events conducted by leading industry professionals, providing unprecedented first-hand insights into how global markets move and evolve.
sections.Jumpstart Your Career Development: Beyond building a strong finance background, MSc Finance students will have other opportunities to ensure they get the best start to their career journey. Supported by the Graduate Studies Career Development Office (GSCDO), students will have access to career coaching and resources, recruitment events, an optional six-month internship extension, and networking opportunities through our strong industry partnerships and our more than 50,000-strong global alumni community.
sections.南洋-交大EMBA | 三月说明会: 08 Mar 2026 02.30 PM - 03.15 PM 上海交通大学徐汇校区安泰楼A305 / 腾讯会议 Add to Calendar
